articles.title: BYD’s Stock Falls After Report Buffett Has Sold All His Stake - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: BYD Co. shares dropped the most in three weeks after a report that Warren Buffett’s investment firm offloaded its stake in the Chinese electric-vehicle maker.

articles.title: Rome gloats as France becomes Italy and Italy becomes France - politico.eu

articles.title: Cannabis companies kicked out of Colorado after reports of liver injuries - CBS News
articles.description: Three companies linked to the production and distribution of a cannabis-based sleep aid will cease operations in Colorado following a settlement and fine that resolve a lawsuit filed by the state.

articles.description: Asian shares rose after a Wall Street rally, with Japanese shares advancing after concerns about the Bank of Japan’s plan to offload its massive exchange-traded fund holdings eased.

articles.description: The MBA-to-VC pipeline remains a very real thing. But that path is a little shakier than it once was, according to PitchBook reporting and new academic research.

articles.title: Teen arrested on suspicion of Vegas Strip attack that cost $100M - SFGATE
articles.description: A teenager has been arrested on suspicion of orchestrating a “sophisticated” cyber attack that cost MGM Resorts $100 million, Las Vegas police announced.
